com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com ho ho ho pattern difficulty medium i assume you already know how to crochet how to crochet in the round how to read a pattern and how to sew pieces together supplies size g hook worsted weight yarn red heart super saver works nicely  red  black  white  a skin tone  green for tree  polyfil gauge is unimportant for this project terms  single_crochet = single_crochet  increase = increase two single_crochet in same stitch  decrease = decrease crochet two stitches together  skip 1 = skip one note little people are worked in the round when i crochet i join rounds and i single_crochet in the same space as joining so i m assuming that at the end of each round you are slip stitching to the first stitch of that round and that you chain 1 to start the next round you can work in spirals if that s easier for you just remember to mark your rounds you want your stitches tight and close together so the stuffing doesn t show through later on to start each piece you can chain 2 and work your 6 stitches into the 2nd stitch from the hook or you can use the magic_ring be creative and have fun page 2 of 10 copyright by sherri bush
